metadata.title: CVE-2024-45620 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the pkcs15-init tool in OpenSC. An attackercould use a crafted USB Device or Smart Card, which would present thesystem with a specially crafted response to APDUs. When buffers arepartially filled with data, initialized parts of the buffer can beincorrectly accessed.

criterions.comment: opensc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
